title: Pixel 4a battery seems to drain faster after October November update android 11
content: The battery life on my Pixel 4A was never like this I used to last 6 hours screen on time 7 hours screen on time now I'm seeing 3 to 4 and 1/2 hours on time I've read a lot of posts about this and I don't know what to do at all anymore any help after the Android 11 update October November security patch updates everything's been downhill from there for a lot of pixel users
